website_summaries.verdict: These easy-to-take and inexpensive soft gels have a decent amount of omega-3 fatty acids.
pros: Each bottle contains 250 soft gels, with each soft gel containing 85 milligrams of EPA and 100 milligrams DHA
The lemon flavor masks any fishy taste while taking the soft gel and there's no fishy aftertaste
cons: Contains added synthetic vitamins and not as much omega-3 fatty acids as some other brands

customer_reviews.title: I will not take it after I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it and then I read an article on how to test or check to see if the Cod oil is real. If you take one of the softgel caps and put it in the FRIDGE. According to the article if the Cod oil turn into white and frozen then the oil is not pure. I tested it and it froze white. I then test the natural valley brand cod oil and the soft gel cap remain with its natural clear color. I'm just saying.............be careful and test it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Received bottle on time, but the nutritional values on the bottle are not what are shown online. The values of vitamin a is only 2500 IU vs the 5000 IU shown in the picture. The bottle also states the vitamins are from both cod liver oil and synthetic vitamins. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great - no burps or fishy aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: DH and I take daily as is good for joints and heart. Neither of us have heath issues but did have some joint pains before taking this. We take it twice daily with means and no more joint pains. It's great in that we never burp it up and it doesn't leave a fishy taste. Definitely will buy again and do recommend. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: I've been taking this Cod Liver Oil since July 2016 ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this Cod Liver Oil since July 2016 and my Cholesterol has dropped 16 points. Hadn't changed much on my diet either. Hope this continues to work!
customer_reviews.author: R. Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great value! My entire family takes these so this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value! My entire family takes these so this gigantic bottle is wonderful. Best surprise: Our vet suggested a fish oil capsule for systemic inflammation in our Chesapeake Bay Retriever (110 lbs). He has been taking one of these per day for two months now for systemic inflammation which brings on chronic ear infections and terrible itchy red/flaky skin. If I can't hide it in something, I can puncture the capsule and drizzle the oil on his food, so far, his skin and ears are MUCH calmer and we'll continue with these.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this stuff because it's SO much easier on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just don't notice the benefits that I have gotten from FCLO or even EVCLO. I wanted to love this stuff because it's SO much easier on the wallet than the higher grade CLOs, but I don't. I'm not sure if this is augmented with synthetic vitamins - but I kinda think that's the case. Back to the expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JSwan

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle I have bought of cod liver oil from this seller. They are kind of big but not that hard to swallow. No fishy smell or taste and I do not have any problems with heartburn. I will continue to buy these softgels and recommend them to anyone who wants to add cod liver oil to their supplements without any gross taste or smell.
customer_reviews.author: Pressure/Grace

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product pictured shows "Vitamin A 2,500 IU" I recieved a bottle that has "5,000 IU vitamin A" and synthetic. NOT happy. will be throwing out. I already take a multi vit and this amount put me way over the top and isnt good for you. thanks for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Maryellynn Taggart

customer_reviews.title: No fishy burps for me
customer_reviews.text: Started taking this when transitioning to a ketogenic diet. Happy with the results. Don't burp up fishy-ness so that's great.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Better than omega3
customer_reviews.text: Norwegian cod liver oil is superior to taking omega 3 for balancing your cholesterol .It is natural and has other vitamins and minerals plus in tablet form their is no taste or after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve symptoms
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis and in reading about natural substances that would help relieve the symptoms I came across Cod Liver Oil. Who knew that something we took as children would be just as beneficial to us as adults.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Got what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for getting what I ordered fast. As far as me rating the product , I have zero opinion at the moment. I have literally taken 2 doses. I can say that the capsules are easy to swallow and have the faintest if any, fish smell. Will update this review once I have done my due diligence.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Orr

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic vitamins added
customer_reviews.text: I buy cod liver oil for the high amounts of A and D. So I expect the A and D vitamins to be only from cod liver oil. The picture of the nutritional panel would lead me to the assumption but when I received it it says "vitamin A from cod liver oil AND retinyl palmitate, vitamin D from cod liver oil AND cholecalciferol" If you don't kind synthetic vitamins then this is a great product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Good as it gets

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell of cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Cod Liver Oil supplement for years (and this brand for the last year or so) and this is the first time I’ve had one that has a very strong CLO smell when the bottle is opened. I don’t know if there’s something wrong with it (does it go bad?), or it’s a different manufacturer or what? If it gets too offensive I may need to pitch it and order a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: SSshopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended cod liver oil rather than fish oil supplements, which is why I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. You get exactly what you ordered. I take two or three per day.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The jar smells terrible inside, but the capsules individually are fine and won't leave any fishy after taste.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: The product is intended for my children that are a younger age. The take it without a fuss and seem to enjoy the flavor. The only concern I have however is the size of the capsule, I wish it was smaller. In short, so far, so good.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product that not only provides omega 3s
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product that not only provides omega 3s, but also vitamins A and D necessary for maximal absorption of those omega 3s. It also has no fishy aftertaste; these have either a light lemon or orange taste. Will definitely continue getting these!

I’m unable to return it since I purchased it a month before I ran out of the existing bottle and it is no longer eligible for return.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. I haven't been taking it for long, but it is of decent quality. There is no fishy aftertaste whatsoever at all. Also, there is no orange flavor, at least not to me. Other than that, it is a decent product with a very decent quality and price.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, it substitute for a difference bottle. If it only I can give a zero star!

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different kinds of Omega 3 oils. Most really bother my stomach to the point I have to stop taking them. I was skeptical when I ordered these, but they are fantastic. They are really helping my blood pressure and my joint pain. I have found my favorite!!! Absolutely ZERO fishy taste, easy to swallow, and no digestive complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bates

customer_reviews.title: but I definitely recommend others to take these capsules
customer_reviews.text: I started using this to help with some minor hormonal acne, and it really has improved my skin drastically. I also use hemp seed oil to "wash" my face morning and night, and take optizinc. I don't know if it's the combo of these products, or this alone, but I definitely recommend others to take these capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Bekins

customer_reviews.title: Objective results
customer_reviews.text: Cholesterol problems run in my family as well as cancer. I wanted something more natural but tolerable from a fishy taste perspective. I was AMAZED that after switching to these, my good cholesterol (HDL) is now almost as high (78) as the bad (LDL) (87). Now I have my husband and 2 oldest sons taking it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Knee Pain Gone
customer_reviews.text: My Chiropractor recommended Cod Liver Oil supplement for my knees. As a road biker and skier, since taking this supplement, my knees no longer hurt. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghetti 2

customer_reviews.title: Lemon is better than fish
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this after a wellness exam at work disclosed that my cholesterol was a little high. Also made some small changes to my diet and incorporated some exercise and after a year my good cholesterol is up and bad is down slightly. I love that these do not have a strong fishy flavor and even if you find yourself burping after taking them, it's a lemony flavor instead of straight fish.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hoover

customer_reviews.title: They’re working for me!
customer_reviews.text: I can actually tell a big difference in the way I feel in the morning. I take along with some extra Vittmin D3 and I wake up without all the usual aches I was having before I started taking them. I will definitely recommend them to anyone. In fact, I’ve recommended them to a few of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don't get that fishy taste (burp). I have been taking Cod Liver Oil since I was a small child and thankfully the Cod Liver Oil has kept me healthy. This brand is by far the best; I feel and look great and as I said, No fishy taste. I will continue to order this brand as the price is perfect and I feel terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Cathe

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to swallow and no after taste
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to swallow and no after taste. I will a long-term customer as I believe it will keep me in a good health.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver oil is what I'm talking about..
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Cod Liver oil for 30+ tears on a daily basis. It had practically eliminated all arthritic neck and knee pain that kept me from playing the tennis I love. I am fanatic about Cod oil and not just any fish oil supplement. And this Norwegian double strength allows me to be able to take just one instead of the three a day of the other. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MillisMike

customer_reviews.title: not sure what they are doing
customer_reviews.text: I just read that the Norwegian waters are actually polluted but Im not basing this review on those claims. I expected to have less dry skin and I have not noticed a difference at all. It has been about 3 weeks and I take 2-3 a day with no noticeable difference. I'm thinking of trying a better brand, though I thought this was supposed to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Red Kat

customer_reviews.title: caught me with their bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely fishy. I am afraid they caught me with their “bait and switch.” The package that arrived contained less than half of the advertised product.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: seems to be working just fine. No aftertaste which is good. I would have given it 5* but my only complaint is that the capsules are so large and I have a problem with gagging on large pills.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that gives good result in long term.
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality product that delivers. As with all supplements, you need to take it for a longer period of time and hold to it and eventually the results will be visible.

customer_reviews.text: So far, I do like this product. I've been taking it for about 3 weeks now and I am noticing a different in my knee. Will continue to take it.

customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Better than regular fish oil for overall health, wellness, and healthy organs. Love this stuff!

customer_reviews.title: A Fishy deal to be sure
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and received a product with a similar label except it didn't say Cod Liver Oil. It simply said Norwegian Fish Oil. I don't know if this is Cod Liver or some combination of various fish oils. Sadly, I took one before realizing this. It made me extremely nauseous. I've taken other (fermented and unfermented) Cod Liver oils before and was never this sick. I don't know what was in it but I'm not impressed with this company or this product.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

product_meta.title: Amazing Omega Norwegian Cod Liver Oil 1000 Mg, Softgels (Lemon, 250 Softgels) -Supports Heart, Joint, Brain, Bone & Immune Health (Non-Gmo,Gluten Free)
feature_bullets: Amazing Omega Norwegian cod liver oil is the purest and best quality cod liver oil, extracted under strict quality standards.
Norwegian cod liver oil has a high concentration of omega-3 fatty acids, Vitamin A & D which may have numerous health benefits. It is also known for its anti-inflammatory properties
Norwegian cod liver oil is primarily known to support Cardiovascular health, Immune function, Brain function and overall health and wellbeing
All Amazing Omega products are manufactured in accordance with Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP), among the highest standards in the world.
All our products are proudly made in USA with Guaranteed Purity & Potency. We offer best quality products for the best value. All our products are Third Party Tested. We do not compromise on quality
